nodes.text: The Trunskan police force was a law enforcement body made of of Trunsks on the planet Trunska. The police force came into being upon the orders of Tyl the Deplorable, the warlord who conquered all of Trunska; formerly, its membership had been soldiers in his armies. These police worked for the Trunsk emperor and enforced the laws of their homeworld. During the Galactic Civil War, these laws required the Trunskan police to crack down on anyone carrying personal weapons or piloting armed starships.
